net.bican.wordpress

Class Wordpress

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bican.wordpress.Wordpress

  • public class Wordpress
extends Object
    The utility class that links xmlrpc calls to Java functions.
    Author:
    Can Bican <can@bican.net>

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wordpress

        public Wordpress(String username,
         String password,
         String xmlRpcUrl)
          throws MalformedURLException
        Parameters:
        username - User name
        password - Password
        xmlRpcUrl - xmlrpc communication point, usually blogurl/xmlrpc.php
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - If the URL is faulty

      • getCommentsCount

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Number of comments (approved, spam, otherwise)
        Throws:
        XmlRpcFault - Generic exception for xml-rpc operations

      • getComments

        public List<Comment> getComments(String status,
                        Integer post_id,
                        Integer number,
                        Integer offset)
                          throws XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        status - One of "approve", "hold", or "spam". Or, null to show all.
        post_id - Filter comments by post_id, or null to not filter.
        number - The number of comments to return, or null for the default (of 10)
        offset - The offset into the set of comments to return, or null for 0
        Returns:
        A list of Comment objects
        Throws:
        XmlRpcFault - Generic exception for xml-rpc operations

      • getComment

        public Comment getComment(Integer comment_id)
                   throws XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        comment_id - comment_id to fetch
        Returns:
        A Comment object
        Throws:
        XmlRpcFault - Generic exception for xml-rpc operations

      • newComment

        public Integer newComment(Integer post_id,
                 Integer comment_parent,
                 String content,
                 String author,
                 String author_url,
                 String author_email)
                   throws XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        post_id - Post to attach the comment to.
        comment_parent - Id of the parent comment (for threading)
        content - Content of comment
        author - Author's name
        author_url - Author's URL (can be empty)
        author_email - Author's Email Address
        Returns:
        the id for the newly created comment.
        Throws:
        XmlRpcFault - Generic exception for xml-rpc operations
